Kwadjo Agyei Addo (amụrụ n'October 15, 1951) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Ghana na onye otu Nzukọ nke Anọ nke Republic nke anọ na-anọchite anya Fanteakwa North Constituency na Eastern Region nke Ghana.

A mụrụ Addo n'ụbọchị iri na ise nke ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1951, n'obodo dị n'ógbè ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Ghana nke a na-akpọ Fanteakwa Ọ gara Akrokerri College of Education Site n'ebe ahụ, o nwetara asambodo onye nkuzi A na agụmakwụkwọ.

A họpụtara Addo na mbụ ka ọ bụrụ nzuko omeiwu na tiketi nke New Patriotic Party n'oge ntuli aka izugbe Ghana nke December 2004 dịka onye otu Fanteakwa North Constituency.. O nwetara vootu 20,867 n'ime vootu puku iri atọ na isii, narị asatọ na iri ise na otu ziri ezi nke na-anọchite anya 56.6%. Kwabena Amankwah Asiamah meriri ya na ntuli aka nke 2008 Party's Primaries bụ onye sonyere na ntuliaka General ma merie.

A họpụtara Addo dị ka onye omeiwu maka mpaghara Fanteakwah North na ndị omeiwu nke anọ nke mba Ghana nke anọ site na Jenụwarị 7, 2005, ruo Jenụwarụ 6, 2009. Na ntuli aka izugbe nke Ghana nke afọ 2004, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ Samuael Ofosu-Ampofo nke National Democratic Congress na Gyimah Aikins Nyantakyi nke Convention People's Party.  Ndị a nwetara vootu 15,678 na vootu 306 n'otu n'otu n'otu n'otu n'otu n'otu n'otu n'otu n'otu n'otu n'otu vootu ziri ezi.  Ndị a bụ 42.5% na 0.8% n'otu n'otu n'otu n'otu nke ngụkọta vootu ziri ezi.. Mpaghara Addo bụ akụkụ nke mpaghara 22 nke New Patriotic Party meriri na mpaghara Ọwụwa Anyanwụ na ntuli aka ahụ. N'ozuzu, New Patriotic Party meriri ngụkọta oche ndị omeiwu 128 na ndị omeiwu nke anọ nke mba Ghana nke anọ.
Addo bụ onye nkuzi na onye ọchụnta ego.
